fieldUpdates.description: Set the Order Current Step picklist value to Approval Copy Sent to HRG
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Order Current Step - Approval Copy

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Order Current Step picklist value to Approval Copy Sent to Client
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Order Current Step - Apprv Copy Clt

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Order Current Step picklist value to Client Canceled
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Order Current Step - Client Cancel

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Order Current Step picklist value to Complete
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Order Current Step - Complete

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Order Current Step picklist value to Final Handbook Processed/Printed
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Order Current Step - Final Handbook

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Order Current Step picklist value to Order Approved - Due Date Assigned
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Order Current Step - Order Approved

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Order Current Step picklist value to Order Approved - Due Date Assigned
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Order Current Step - Order Approved

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Order Current Step picklist value to Order Voided
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Order Current Step - Order Voided

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Order Current Step picklist value to Order in Discrepancy
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Order Current Step - Order in Discr

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Order Current Step picklist value to Spanish Translation Needed
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Order Current Step - Spanish Trans

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Order Current Step picklist value to Updated Order Submitted to Handbooks
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Order Current Step - Updated Order
HBK: Order Date Update

fieldUpdates.description: Primary Contacts Email Address for email alert use
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Populate Primary Contact Email Adde
HBK: Ship Binder w/o Text Update
HBK: Tab Color Update

fieldUpdates.description: Clears the value in the Task Complete Date field. This Field Update is called by multiple workflow rules.
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Task Complete Date Clear

fieldUpdates.description: Clears the value in the Task Complete Date field. This Field Update is called by multiple workflow rules
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Task Complete Date Clear

fieldUpdates.description: Clears the value in the Task Due Date field. This Field Update is called by multiple workflow rules.
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Task Due Date Clear

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Task Due Date with 10 business days from today.
fieldUpdates.formula: CASE(MOD(TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, TODAY() + 12, 1, TODAY() + 14, 2, TODAY() + 14, 3, TODAY() + 14, 4, TODAY() + 14, 5, TODAY() + 14, 6, TODAY() + 13, TODAY())
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Task Due Date plus 10 Bus Days

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Task Due Date with 10 business days from today.
fieldUpdates.formula: CASE(MOD(TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, TODAY() + 12, 1, TODAY() + 14, 2, TODAY() + 14, 3, TODAY() + 14, 4, TODAY() + 14, 5, TODAY() + 14, 6, TODAY() + 13, TODAY())
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Task Due Date plus 10 Bus Days

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Task Due Date with 13 business days from today.
fieldUpdates.formula: CASE(MOD(TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, TODAY() + 17, 1, TODAY() + 17, 2, TODAY() + 17, 3, TODAY() + 19, 4, TODAY() + 19, 5, TODAY() + 19, 6, TODAY() + 18, TODAY())
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Task Due Date plus 13 Bus Days

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Task Due Date with 3 business days from today.
fieldUpdates.formula: CASE(MOD(TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, TODAY() + 3, 1, TODAY() + 3, 2, TODAY() + 3, 3, TODAY() + 5, 4, TODAY() + 5, 5, TODAY() + 5, 6, TODAY() + 4, TODAY())
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Task Due Date plus 3 Bus Days

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Task Due Date with 5 business days from today.
fieldUpdates.formula: CASE(MOD(TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, TODAY() + 5, 1, TODAY() + 7, 2, TODAY() + 7, 3, TODAY() + 7, 4, TODAY() + 7, 5, TODAY() + 7, 6, TODAY() + 6, TODAY())
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Task Due Date plus 5 Bus Days

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Task Due Date with 6 business days from today.
fieldUpdates.formula: CASE(MOD( TODAY () - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, TODAY ()+8, 1, TODAY ()+8, 2, TODAY ()+8, 3, TODAY ()+8, 4, TODAY ()+8, 5, TODAY ()+10, 6, TODAY ()+9, null)
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Task Due Date plus 7 Bus Days

fieldUpdates.description: Clears the value in the Task Type field. This Field Update is called by multiple workflow rules.
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: Task Type Clear

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Repeat Most Recent Handbook Process field to no value.
fieldUpdates.name: HBK: clear Repeat Most Recent Process

fieldUpdates.description: Set Ref HRE/CHB Order.Quote Approved Date to the current date
fieldUpdates.name: HRE: Quote Approved Date

fieldUpdates.description: Fills in date that Advisor Draft is sent to client
fieldUpdates.name: Handbook Draft to Client Date

rules.fullName: HBK%3A AC Reminder email CHB - Onboarding
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND (7 OR 8)
rules.description: This sends the CHB AC reminder emails to the client during the Onboarding process

rules.fullName: HBK%3A AC Reminder email CHB - Support
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND (7 OR 8)
rules.description: This sends the AC CHB reminder email to a client, but uses the Approval Copy to Client field, NOT the Approval Copy to Client Date field.

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Clear Task Due Date and Task Type
rules.description: This rule clears the values from both the Task Due Date and Task Type fields when a value is entered for the Void Date field.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Onboarding Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support Order Record Type") ) && ISCHANGED(Void_Date__c) && (NOT(ISNULL(Void_Date__c)))

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Handbooks Process Needed changes
rules.description: This rule sets the Order Date field and clears the values from both the Task Due Date and Task Type fields when a value is entered or changed for the Handbooks Process Needed field.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Onboarding Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support Order Record Type") ) && ISCHANGED(Handbooks_Process_Needed__c) && (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Handbooks_Process_Needed__c, '')))

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Order Current Step - AC to Client - Onboarding
rules.description: This workflow will look for the setting of the Approval Copy to Client Date field for Onboarding stand-alone records. When this occurs, the HBK: Order Current Step - Apprv Copy Clt field update will be executed.

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Order Current Step - AC to Client - Support
rules.description: This workflow will look for the setting of the Approval Copy to Client Date field for Support stand-alone records. When this occurs,the HBK: Order Current Step - Apprv Copy Clt field update will be executed.

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Order Current Step - Client Canceled
rules.description: This rule sets the Order Current Step value to 'Client Canceled' when the Void Date is populated and the selected Validation Reason is "Client Canceled".
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type") ) && ISCHANGED(Void_Date__c) && (NOT(ISNULL(Void_Date__c)) && ISCHANGED(Void_Reason__c) && (ISPICKVAL(Void_Reason__c, 'Client Canceled')) )

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Order Current Step - Complete
rules.description: This rule sets the Order Current Step value to 'Complete' when the Final Approval Copy to HRG Date field is populated AND the Spanish Translation Needed field has NOT been checked.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Onboarding Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support Order Record Type") ) && (NOT(ISNULL(Final_Approval_Copy_to_HRG_Date__c))) && (NOT(Spanish_Requested__c)) && (Open_Discrepancies__c = 0) && (ISNULL(Void_Date__c)) && (ISPICKVAL(Void_Reason__c, ''))

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Order Current Step - Order Voided
rules.description: This rule sets the Order Current Step value to 'Order Voided' when the Void Date is populated and the selected Validation Reason is NOT "Client Canceled".
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type") ) && ISCHANGED(Void_Date__c) && (NOT(ISNULL(Void_Date__c)) && ISCHANGED(Void_Reason__c) && (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Void_Reason__c, 'Client Canceled'))) && (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Void_Reason__c, ''))) )

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Order Current Step - Order in Discrepancy
rules.description: This rule sets the Order Current Step value to 'Order in Discrepancy' when the Open Discrepancies field > 0.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type") ) &&(Open_Discrepancies__c > 0) && (ISNULL(Void_Date__c)) && (ISPICKVAL(Void_Reason__c, ''))

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Order Current Step - Spanish Complete
rules.description: This rule sets the Order Current Step value to 'Complete' when the Final Approval Copy to HRG/Client Date field is populated AND both the Spanish Translation Needed field has been checked and the Spanish Task Complete Date field has been populated.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Onboarding Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support Order Record Type") ) && (NOT(ISNULL(Final_Approval_Copy_to_HRG_Date__c))) && (Spanish_Requested__c) && (NOT(ISNULL(Spanish_Task_Complete_Date__c))) && (Open_Discrepancies__c = 0) && (ISNULL(Void_Date__c)) && (ISPICKVAL(Void_Reason__c, ''))

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Order Current Step - Spanish Translation Needed
rules.description: This rule sets the Order Current Step value to 'Spanish Translation Needed' when the Final Approval Copy to HRG Date field is populated AND the Spanish Translation Needed field has been checked.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Onboarding Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support Order Record Type") ) && (NOT(ISNULL(Final_Approval_Copy_to_HRG_Date__c))) && (Spanish_Requested__c) && (ISNULL(Spanish_Task_Complete_Date__c)) && (Open_Discrepancies__c = 0) && (ISNULL(Void_Date__c)) && (ISPICKVAL(Void_Reason__c, ''))

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Order Current Step - Updated Order Submitted to Handbooks
rules.description: This rule sets the Order Current Step value to 'Updated Order Submitted to Handbooks' when either the Type of Request field or the Handbooks Process Needed field or the Repeat Most Recent Handbook Process field is altered from a previous value.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Onboarding Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support Order Record Type") ) && ( ( (ISCHANGED(Type_of_Request__c)) && (LEN(TEXT(PRIORVALUE( Type_of_Request__c ))) > 0) ) || ( (ISCHANGED(Handbooks_Process_Needed__c)) && (LEN(TEXT(PRIORVALUE( Handbooks_Process_Needed__c ))) > 0) ) || ( (ISCHANGED(Repeat_Most_Recent_Handbook_Process__c)) && (ISPICKVAL(Repeat_Most_Recent_Handbook_Process__c, 'Yes')) ) ) && (Open_Discrepancies__c = 0) && (ISNULL(Void_Date__c)) && (ISPICKVAL(Void_Reason__c, ''))

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Populate ASO Foundational Task Due Date plus 10 Bus Days
rules.description: This rule calls a field update to set the Task Due Date field to 10 business days when a specific picklist value is entered or changed for the Task Type field. This rule also calls a field update to clear the Task Complete Date field.
rules.formula: ((RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") ) && ( ISCHANGED(Task_Type__c) || ISNEW() ) && ((ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c,"ASO Foundational")))

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Populate Ship Binder w%2Fo Text

criteriaItems.value: HRE Order Record Type,Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type

rules.description: This rule sets the Ship Binder w/o Text field to "True" when the "Binders Only" value is entered for the Type of Request field.

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Populate Tab Color

criteriaItems.value: Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type,Handbook Onboarding Order Record Type,Handbook Supply Order Record Type

rules.description: Sets the Tab Color picklist value to "No Tabs" when 8.5 x 11 is checked.

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Populate Task Due Date plus 10 Bus Days
rules.description: This rule calls a field update to set the Task Due Date field to 10 business days when a specific picklist value is entered or changed for the Task Type field. This rule also calls a field update to clear the Task Complete Date field.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type") ) && ( ISCHANGED(Task_Type__c) || ISNEW() ) && ( (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, "0-9 Handbook Request")) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, "AC Changes")) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, "Voluntary Update")) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c,"Legal Update")) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c,"PEO Foundational"))||(ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c,"Manual Handbook Copy"))|| (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c,"ASO-PEO Transfer")))

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Populate Task Due Date plus 10 Bus Days- Stand-alone
rules.description: This rule calls a field update to set the Task Due Date field to 10 business days when a specific picklist value is entered or changed for the Task Type field. This rule also calls field updates for Task Complete Date and Order Current Step fields.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Onboarding Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support Order Record Type") ) && (ISCHANGED(Task_Type__c)|| ISNEW()) && ((ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Manual Handbook Copy')) )

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Populate Task Due Date plus 3 Bus Days
rules.description: This rule calls a field update to set the Task Due Date field to 3 business days when a specific picklist value is entered or changed for the Task Type field. This rule also calls a field update to clear the Task Complete Date field.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type") ) && ISCHANGED(Task_Type__c) && (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Spanish Translation'))

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Populate Task Due Date plus 3 Bus Days - stand-alone
rules.description: This rule calls a field update to set the Task Due Date field to 3 business days when a specific picklist value is entered or changed for the Task Type field. This rule also calls 2 field updates for Task Complete Date and Order Current Step fields.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Onboarding Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support Order Record Type") ) && ISCHANGED(Task_Type__c) || ISNEW() && ( (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'New HGS')) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'New HDW')) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Advisor Draft')) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'AC Changes')) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Voluntary Update')) ||(ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Spanish Translation')) )

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Populate Task Due Date plus 5 Bus Days
rules.description: This rule calls a field update to set the Task Due Date field to 5 business days when a specific picklist value is entered or changed for the Task Type field. This rule also calls a field update to clear the Task Complete Date field.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type") ) && ( ISCHANGED(Task_Type__c) || ISNEW() ) && ( (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'New HGS')) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'New HDW')) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Electronic Only')) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'HDQ')) ||(ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Enhanced Foundational')) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Courtesy Update')) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Migration')) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'PEO Foundational Changes')) )

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Populate Task Due Date plus 5 Bus Days - stand-alone
rules.description: This rule calls a field update to set the Task Due Date field to 5 business days when a specific picklist value is entered or changed for the Task Type field. This rule also calls 2 field updates for Task Complete Date and Order Current Step fields.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Onboarding Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support Order Record Type") ) && (ISCHANGED(Task_Type__c)|| ISNEW()) && ((ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Legal Update')) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'HDQ')) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Migration')) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Courtesy Update')) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Custom Policies/Formatting'))||(ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Enhanced Foundational')) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'HRE Foundational')) )

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Populate Task Due Date plus 7 Bus Days
rules.description: This rule calls a field update to set the Task Due Date to 7 business days when a specific picklist value is entered or changed for the Task Type field. This rule also calls 2 other field updates and sends an email alert containing the Task Due Date.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type") ) && ISCHANGED(Task_Type__c) && ( (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Ok to Print')) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Reorder')) )

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Populate Task Due Date plus 7 Bus Days - stand-alone
rules.description: This rule calls a field update to set the Task Due Date field to 7 business days when a specific picklist value is entered or changed for the Task Type field. This rule also calls 2 field updates for Task Complete Date and Order Current Step fields.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Onboarding Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support Order Record Type") ) && ISCHANGED(Task_Type__c) && ( (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Ok to Print')) || (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c, 'Reorder')) )

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Repeat Most Recent Handbook Process changes
rules.description: This rule sets the Order Date field and clears the values from both the Task Due Date and Task Type fields when a value is entered or changed for the Repeat Most Recent Handbook Process field.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Onboarding Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support Order Record Type") ) && ISCHANGED(Repeat_Most_Recent_Handbook_Process__c) && (ISPICKVAL(Repeat_Most_Recent_Handbook_Process__c, 'Yes'))

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Repeat Most Recent Process - clear value
rules.description: This rule sets the Repeat Most Recent Process value to '--None--' when the Task Complete Date/Sent_to_Print_Date__c field is altered from a previous blank value.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Onboarding Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support Order Record Type") ) && (NOT(ISNULL(Sent_to_Print_Date__c))) && (ISNULL(PRIORVALUE(Sent_to_Print_Date__c)))

rules.fullName: HBK%3A Type of Request changes
rules.description: This rule sets the Order Date field and clears the values from both the Task Due Date and Task Type fields when a value is entered or changed for the Type of Request field.
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Onboarding Order Record Type") || (RecordType.Name = "Handbook Support Order Record Type") ) && ISCHANGED(Type_of_Request__c) && (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Request__c, '')))

rules.fullName: HRE Handbook Not Finalized - Email Reminder - Onboarding and Support Cases
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 AND 5) AND 6 AND 7 AND (8 OR 9)

criteriaItems.value: Handbook Onboarding Order Record Type,Handbook Support Order Record Type

rules.description: This sends reminders for the client to review their handbook in ThinkHR for Onboarding and Support cases

rules.fullName: Handbook Draft Sent Date - HBK Onboarding and Support

criteriaItems.value: Handbook Onboarding Order Record Type,Handbook Support Order Record Type

rules.description: When Task Type = Advisor Draft, and Task Complete Date is not blank, update Handbook Draft to Client Date field with the current date

rules.fullName: Oasis HBK%3A Populate Task Due Date plus 5 Bus Days
rules.formula: ( (RecordType.Name = "Handbook PEO Order Record Type") ) && ( ISCHANGED(Task_Type__c) || ISNEW() ) && (ISPICKVAL(Task_Type__c,"Oasis New Handbook"))

rules.fullName: test workflow for primary contact email
